programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: As the shadows rise, the Doctor forges an alliance with the mysterious River Song. While the Doctor discovers secrets and revelations about his own future, the sinister Nodes declare that Donna is doomed.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor is trapped and powerless on the planet Midnight. A woman called Sky seems to hold the answers he needs, but paranoia takes hold of the Doctor and Sky turns his strengths against him.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In the Doctor's absence, Harriet Jones assembles a secret army of Earth's greatest heroes to fight the Dalek Empire.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor is defenceless as the Daleks activate their master plan. The secret army sets out to battle Davros, knowing that it is prophesied that one of them will die.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve in 1851 and Cybermen stalk the snow of Victorian London. When the Doctor arrives and starts to investigate a spate of mysterious deaths, he's surprised to meet another Doctor, with his own sonic screwdriver and cockney assistant.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor finds himself and those around him in serious danger after a strange bus ride.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor helps combat a crisis from beneath Mars' surface.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The TARDIS collides with a spacecraft replica of the Titanic and the Doctor must make a stand against a race of android angels.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The human race rejoices as the ghosts of loved ones return home. But as the Doctor, Rose and Jackie investigate the Torchwood Tower, the whole of modern-day Earth threatens to fall.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The TARDIS lands in 1930s New York. In the midst of the Depression, people are disappearing off the streets. Meanwhile, at the very top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor's oldest enemies are at work, plotting their largest scheme yet.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Dalek Sec is reborn in human form and plans to build a Dalek empire in 1930s New York. While Martha fights for her life at the top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor must enter into an unholy alliance in order to change Dalek history forever.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In the Doctor's absence, Harriet Jones assembles a secret army of Earth's greatest heroes to fight the Dalek Empire.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor is defenceless as the Daleks activate their master plan. The secret army sets out to battle Davros, knowing that it is prophesied that one of them will die.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor helps combat a crisis from beneath Mars' surface.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Amy arrive in one of the most important eras of Britain's past - World War Two. In a secret room beneath London, the infamous alien villains, the Daleks, are dreaming up a deadly plot.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor receives a message from his allies that the Pandorica, which allegedly holds the most fearsome being in the universe, is about to open.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Rory maintains a vigil for Amy while the Doctor is trapped in the Pandorica. The key to restoring the universe may lie with a little girl who still believes in stars.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: All of time and space hangs in balance by the shores of Lake Silencio in Utah; for this is the day the Doctor dies.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor takes on a new role as Cybermen invade the streets of London and old friends unite against old enemies. Meanwhile, questions remain as to whether the UNIT can contain Missy.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: When the skies of Earth are frozen by a mysterious alien force, Clara needs her friend, but no one can find the Doctor. As past deeds come back to haunt him, old enemies will come face-to-face.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Trapped and alone in a terrifying Dalek city, the Doctor is at the heart of an evil Empire; no sonic, no TARDIS, nobody to help. With his greatest temptation before him, he must try hard to resist.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A chance encounter with a girl with a star in her eye leads to a terrifying chase across time and space. Bill's mind is opened to a Universe that is bigger and more exciting than she could possibly have imagined.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The magical final chapter of the twelfth Doctor's journey sees the Time Lord team up with his former self, the first ever Doctor, and a returning Bill Potts, for one last adventure.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The human race rejoices as the ghosts of loved ones return home. But as the Doctor, Rose and Jackie investigate the Torchwood Tower, the whole of modern-day Earth threatens to fall.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The TARDIS lands in 1930s New York. In the midst of the Depression, people are disappearing off the streets. Meanwhile, at the very top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor's oldest enemies are at work, plotting their largest scheme yet.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Dalek Sec is reborn in human form and plans to build a Dalek empire in 1930s New York. While Martha fights for her life at the top of the Empire State Building, the Doctor must enter into an unholy alliance in order to change Dalek history forever.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Clara is alone in Victorian London with a man she doesn't know, a dinosaur in the Thames, and a spate of deadly spontaneous combustions. The Doctor has changed. It's time you knew him.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A Dalek fleet surrounds a lone rebel ship and only the Doctor can help them.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: When Robots threaten Sherwood forest, the Doctor must join forces with Robin Hood to stop the evil reign of the Sheriff of Nottingham.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Clara crash land on the moon to find a world of horror: a mining base full of corpses, vicious spider-like creatures poised to attack and a terrible dilemma.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor and Clara are on the most beautiful train in history speeding among the stars of the future. Unfortunately a deadly creature is stalking the passengers and once you see the mummy you only have 66 seconds to live.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Separated from the Doctor, Clara discovers a new menace from another dimension. With people to save and the Doctor trapped, Clara comes up against an enemy that exists beyond human perception.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: One morning in every city in the world, the human race wakes up to face the most surprising invasion yet. Everywhere, a forest has grown and taken back the Earth.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In the mysterious world of the Nethersphere, plans have been drawn. Missy is about to come face to face with the Doctor and an impossible choice is looming.

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor attempts to break into the most dangerous bank in the cosmos.

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Madame de Pompadour's dreams are being haunted by a stranger called the Doctor. When she finds the court of Versailles under attack from clockwork droids she tries to summon her mysterious Doctor to save the day.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A young woman finds cryptic messages from 1969 coming from a stranger called the Doctor when people start disappearing.

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: After being going for five years, the Doctor reappears in Amy's life and she is faced with having to make a terrible choice.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Amy finds herself battling a deadly alien in France with none other than Vincent Van Gogh.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: In 2013, something terrible is awakening in London's National Gallery. In 1562, a murderous plot is afoot in Elizabethan England. Meanwhile, somewhere in space an ancient battle reaches its devastating conclusion.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Doctor must sacrifice everything to save a town called Christmas from the Time Lord's greatest enemies.

programme.title: Doctor Who

programme.desc: The Doctor must sacrifice everything to save a town called Christmas from the Time Lord's greatest enemies.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Once the Doctor and her crew find their way back to Yorkshire, they find something stirring amongst the eight-legged arachnid population of Sheffield.

programme.title: Santos x Grêmio
programme.desc: No jogo de ida das quartas de final, o Santos recebe o Grêmio no estádio da Vila Belmiro. O Peixe tenta levar a melhor em casa e para isso conta com Marinho e companhia. Já o Tricolor tenta chegar à sua quarta semifinal seguida no torneio.

programme.desc: A single mom is unemployed and broke at Christmas. She is desperate to find a job in order to make her daughter's holiday a happy one.

programme.title: Christmas Joy
programme.desc: A woman must return to her hometown to care for her aunt during the Christmas break. While there, she meets a man and learns there is no place like home for the holidays.

programme.title: The Mistletoe Secret
programme.desc: A woman has big hopes for her town's big holiday adventure, until she meets the man behind the plan.

programme.title: A Christmas Duet
programme.desc: Famous for their beloved Christmas duet, fate brings ex-music duo together over the holidays, just in time for the annual Yuletide Festival.

programme.title: With Love, Christmas
programme.desc: An ad executive and her uptight co-worker must create the ultimate Christmas commercial. To complicate things, they are also each-others Secret Santa.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two NYC-bound travellers find themselves linked when a storm waylays their flight to an airport hotel in Buffalo. Desperate to get home in time for Christmas, a woman seeks help, in any form, to make a Christmas miracle happen.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: A woman loses her job and beau on the same day and reluctantly accepts a position in Alaska. When she gets the position she originally hoped for, she must choose between a life she's always wanted and her new life in Alaska.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: Christmas Comes Twice
programme.desc: A top newscaster finds herself regretting letting her man go five years ago. When a Christmas carnival comes to town, she is brought back in time to reconnect with him.

programme.title: The Christmas House
programme.desc: When a TV star's parents ask him to bring back a revered family tradition, he revisits the family's traditions and brings back the magic of Christmases past.

programme.title: A Cookie Cutter Christmas
programme.desc: Two long-time rival school teachers duke it out during the holidays in a bake-off. With both determined to win the prize, their competitiveness could jeopardize what matters most this Christmas season.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: Newlywed couple celebrates their first Christmas by inviting their families to join them. When he gets laid off and she finds out she is pregnant, they try and keep their secrets hidden to have a smooth holiday.

programme.title: Entertaining Christmas
programme.desc: A cookbook author's daughter is set to take over the family business. Only problem is, she can't cook. When she sees an online video asking for help, she is determined to change the family ways, and become known for helping in other ways.

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead
programme.desc: A famous actress heads to a Christmas-obsessed town to film a movie, and is thrown for a loop when a romance brews between her and a local inn keeper, who's a single dad. As she gets a taste of small-town life, she discovers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor
programme.desc: A rookie party planner works with a serious and all-business to put together a Christmas festival with help from a merrily enigmatic caretaker who looks like Santa. As the festival approaches, the spirit of the holidays may lead to a wish of love.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers are thrown together to help an elderly woman recover her lost savings. While working together, the magic of the season prevails, leading the couple to discover something they have been missing, love.

programme.title: Finding Santa
programme.desc: When the Santa who stars in their annual holiday parade falls off his sleigh and injures himself, a woman must go on a quest to find the perfect Santa.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is hired to become a personal shopper for an uptight, corporate executive. As they work together, she teaches him that Christmas has less to do with the money that is spent, and more to do with the people in your life.

programme.title: Christmas She Wrote
programme.desc: A romance writer has her column cancelled right before Christmas, so she heads home to reconnect with her family and sparks some romance of her own.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A pastry chef makes it to the final round of a renowned baking competition and finds herself asking her high school sweetheart for help. As they grow closer, she realizes the must embrace the Christmas spirit or risk losing a chance at love.

programme.title: Picture a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A world-travelling photographer takes some time off at Christmas to care for her grandmother. While there, she meets her neighbour, who needs help caring for his young nephew, and love develops.

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when her long time crush, Mitch, moves to her little town. Once she discovers his love for Christmas has changed she vows to bring his holiday spirit back.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered marketing executive on her way to a wedding is derailed by car trouble. A fork in the road leads her to Christmas Valley, and her unexpected journey leaves her wondering what her life has been missing.

programme.title: Love, Lights, Hanukkah!
programme.desc: A woman prepares her restaurant for the busiest time of the year when she receives the results of her DNA test indicating that she is Jewish. The discovery leads her to a new family, and an unlikely romance over eight nights.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with her liver donor, and his selfless gesture leads to a Christmas miracle for everyone.

programme.title: Christmas at Dollywood
programme.desc: When a NYC event planner returns to Tennessee to plan the Christmas celebration at Dollywood, she's paired with the head of operations who thinks he can handle the party just fine on his own.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: Identical twin sisters decide to swap lives for the holidays, learning valuable lessons along the way.

programme.title: Tournament of Roses Parade
programme.desc: We may not be able to host the traditional Rose Parade, but we won't let January 1 pass without celebrating the New Year in spectacular fashion. Join us for a reimagined celebration featuring musical and marching band performances and guest appearances.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility and Snowmen
programme.desc: A Christmas enthusiast, and her sister, clash with their latest client, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: A woman is hired by a Royal family to repair a carousel for them before Christmas.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Bride
programme.desc: A wedding planner heads off to Alaska to source a rare flower for a bride. While there, she is charmed by a handsome botanist who shows her what the town has to offer for the holidays.

programme.title: Let It Snow
programme.desc: When a resort executive is sent to a newly purchased lodge in Maine with instructions to turn it into an ultra-modern resort, she finds a charming, successful lodge loaded with holiday spirit and makes a connection with the owner's handsome son.

programme.title: Christmas Town
programme.desc: A woman leaves behind a life in Boston to embark on a new adventure. Unbeknownst to her, she ends up on an unexpected detour that changes both her life, and her romantic future.

programme.title: A Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job at a ritzy NYC hotel, a woman accepts a job as a governess to a young girl. She finds herself attracted to the girl’s father, who is king of the country, and love reigns over the kingdom.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur invents a new dating app designed to help singles find dates to events. She personally tests it out in the weeks before Christmas and is connected with a like-minded individual whom she's already dated, several times.

programme.title: Christmas List
programme.desc: Planning a storybook Christmas with her boyfriend proves challenging for a woman when he goes AWOL. A tempting new romance turns her life upside down.

programme.title: A Homecoming for the Holidays
programme.desc: A country-singer returns home for the holidays and meets her brother's friend, an ex-soldier. While home, she works on her new song, plus, spends time with the friend to help him build a house.

programme.title: Holly and Ivy

programme.desc: A disgruntled New York ad executive swaps houses over Christmas with a disheartened North Carolina repairman, who is going through his own heartache.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas

programme.title: The Mistletoe Inn

programme.title: A Family Christmas Gift
programme.desc: A woman spends the holidays with her aunt to help plan a Christmas concert. While there, she finds herself drawing closer to her aunt, and, to the new love in her life.

programme.title: Christmas Incorporated

programme.title: Christmas in Montana

programme.title: A Gift to Remember
programme.desc: An accident between a sweet bookshop worker and a handsome stranger leaves him without his memory.

programme.title: Project Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A woman plays the small-town Santa and makes holiday wishes come true. This year, she finds not only is she able to help others, she is also able to help herself.

programme.title: Deliver by Christmas
programme.desc: A bakery owner is enchanted by a mystery client whom she has never met.

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas

programme.desc: Five guests converge on an inn to celebrate Christmas. With a little help from the owner, a woman discovers that an event from her past connects the groups and may change their lives.

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple fakes marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival, and their business.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland
programme.desc: A woman brings her kids with her on a business trip to Memphis so they can go to Graceland. While there, she bumps into an old flame from her singing days in college. Together they make beautiful holiday music.

programme.title: Meet Me at Christmas
programme.desc: A woman is forced to take the reins when her son's wedding planner quits on Christmas Eve. She receives some unexpected help from the bride's uncle, and realizes that fate has sent her a man from her past.

programme.title: A Merry Christmas Match
programme.desc: A woman lives in a ski village and works at the local antiques shop. One day, the local 'Christmas Catch Ryder' stops by her shop, and sparks fly between them.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: A mysterious key and riddle land on the doorsteps of two different people, they determine they must work together to solve the mystery.

programme.title: The Angel Tree

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas

programme.title: The Christmas Bow

programme.title: Christmas on Honeysuckle Lane

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind

programme.title: Joe Exotic: Tigers, Lies and Cover-Up
programme.desc: An ex-boyfriend believes Carole cares more about her animals than most people, while a former homicide cop explores property transfers from Carole to handyman Kenneth Farr and searches a lake for Don's body and a meat grinder.

programme.title: Joe Exotic: Tigers, Lies and Cover-Up

programme.title: The Crimes That Changed Us
programme.desc: When a Hollywood executive and his wife are brutally killed in a wealthy neighbourhood, suspicion falls on their two sons. Charged with the murders, the brothers reveal disturbing family secrets, and the scene is set for one of the most shocking trials.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A Karmann Ghia aficionado wants some very specific upgrades for his new purchase. Custom trim, wheels, lowered stance, new paint and new upholstery are some of the items that will give this car a new lease on life.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: When Donnie decides that he wants to take his 1968 Fastback to SEMA, Dan and Fantomworks are thrown for a loop. Now, they need to get the Fastback and a 1964 Corvette to the prestigious show within a crushing time frame.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: We follow the controlled chaos of Fantomworks when there are 85 cars being worked on and multiple owners who expect miracles.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Dan thinks that Mickey's 1970 Chevelle is perfect. Mickey wants them to tear it apart and upgrade everything to make it his own. Thom's 1963 Studebaker is a project car with a nightmare combination of leaks, bad parts, and failing safety systems.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Rick is the proud owner of a garish 1972 Cadillac Hearse. He comes to FantomWorks for a nightmare combination of gadgets, gizmos, and upgrades - including flamethrowers. Merlyn and Lynn have a 1959 Chevy Apache that hasn't been driven beyond their yard.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Scott's '53 Fleetwood is a challenge that takes a turn to the crazy when Dan has to add rare features that the car never had in the first place. John wants FantomWorks to complete a half-finished restoration and get his prized 1967 Mercury running.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: When Rich and Kathy tried to get their 1951 Buick Super back on the road they were taken for a ride. It's now up to FantomWorks to succeed where four other shops failed. Jim's classic 1961 Corvette has a curious ailment, and Dan has to solve the mystery.

programme.title: FantomWorks

programme.title: FantomWorks

programme.title: FantomWorks

programme.title: Junkyard Empire

programme.title: Dateline: Secrets Uncovered

programme.title: Buried in the Backyard

programme.title: Buried in the Backyard
